channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: It's an emotional journey today as Alistair Appleton helps a buyer with a ?260,00 budget to escape her small flat near Heathrow airport. She is desperate for some peace and quiet, and is hoping that the Wiltshire countryside will deliver the cottage she's been dreaming of. Talk turns from property to agriculture when Alistair meets a group of young farmers to discuss their views on the future of the industry.
